typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		County as string,
		Year as integer,
		Population as string,
		{Index Count} as integer,
		{Index Rate} as integer,
		{Violent Count} as integer,
		{Violent Rate} as string,
		{Property Count} as string,
		{Property Rate} as string,
		{Firearm Count} as string,
		{Firearm Rate} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> source1
source1 filter(County=='Alleghany' || County == 'Bronx' || County == 'Broome' ||County == 'Erie') ~> filterOnCounty
filterOnCounty sort(desc({Violent Count}, true)) ~> Sort1
Sort1 derive({deltaColumn } = {Index Count}-{Violent Count}) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['testFlow.parquet'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
